font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 不服管束的，倔强的： refusing or likely to refuse to proceed, act, or function as directed or expected
【例】 The balky horse refused the jump
【近】 contumacious[,kɑntu'meʃəs], defiant[dɪ'faɪənt], perverse[pə'vɜːs], intractable, obstreperous[əb'strep(ə)rəs], refractory, unruly, untoward, wayward. willful
【反】 compliant, docile, subdued, submissive, tractable 顺从的
